{{Infobox artist discography |Artist = [[Katy Garbi]]
Greece & Cyprus |Logo = |Image = |Caption = |Studio = 17 |Studio link = Albums | Live = 1 | Live link = Live and compilation albums |Compilation = 1 |Compilation link = Live and compilation albums | EP = 3 | EPs link = EPs | 1Option = 2 | 1Option name = CD singles | 1Option link = CD singles | 1Option color = #4169E1 |Singles = 2 |Singles link = Singles | 2Option = 3 | 2Option name = Digital releases | 2Option link = Digital download singles | 2Option color = violet |Soundtrack = 2 |Soundtrack link = Soundtracks |3Option = see link |3Option name = Videography |3Option color = #99CCFF | Option = 22 | Option name = Collaborations | Option link = Collaborations | Option color = turquoise |References = |Ref link = }} This page includes the '''discography''' of Greek singer '''[[Katy Garbi]]'''. Starting in 1989 with her first album, Garbi has released 17 albums in total along with several compilations and CD singles. ==Albums== Garbi's albums ''[[Arhizo Polemo]]'' and ''[[Evaisthiseis]]'' both achieved multiplatinum status and are among the top 10 selling CDs of the 1990s . Also, her album ''[[To Kati]]'' (4x Platinum) is one of the best selling CDs in 2000s. ==Studio albums== ** denotes unknown or unavailable information. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2" style="width:230px;"| Album details !colspan="2"| Peak chart positions !rowspan="2"| Sales !rowspan="2"| [[Music recording sales certification|Certifications]]
